description: Our team (Efinity Technologies) is developing a social movie site for rating, reviewing, and recommending movies. We utilized the .NET Platform for this project, leveraging Blazor Server and SignalR for a highly interactive experience.
highlights: Co-architect during the initial project specification and estimate.
Primary developer responsible for ensuring all features were implemented on time.
Delegated tasks our junior team member and reviewed their code for quality.
Utilized GitHub for collaboration between developers, designers, and our client (via GitHub issues).
Added real-time features, like user-to-user chat, using SignalR.
summary: "Movie recommendations by those who like what you like."
title: Moshoboga

description: Authored several features for HubSpot hosted pharmasalmanac.com, including a custom dynamic survey linked directly to an existing API. Refactored existing endpoints for a significant performance increase.
highlights: Significantly increased performance of report-generation endpoints within the .NET Core API.
Extended the database and API to service new features for Pharama's Almanac in conjunction with a dynamic HTML/JS-based survey to gather said information.
In HubSpot, created new tools for administators to manage company data/surveys.
title: Pharma's Almanac Upgrades

description: Retrofitted an existing database with a new .NET Core API server and a secured Svelte-powered SPA.
title: Dramatic Artists Backend

description: Primary developer on a custom business-management application featuring secure logins, google-maps integration, pdf generation, email, uploading, and AJAX-powered interactivity.
highlights: Lead developer for an EfinityTech project.
Built a business-critical web application using ASP.NET Core MVC and JavaScript.
Implemented JWT security to compliment an asynchronous client experience made possible through RESTful Web Services.

Utilized the jQuery library to develop a responsive and interactive front-end. Developed important backend features including PDF generation and Email notifications. Managed SQL databases with Microsoft SQL Server.
title: International Field Services

description: Ongoing maintenance & development of Efinity Technology's internal website management platform, built on ASP.NET (Webforms & Core).
